strings.EQUIPMENT_MULTISHOPCARD_PICKUP: Gain 2 stacks of "Credit Score" on use. Making a purchase uses a stack and you gain 10% cash back. Multishops purchased also keep all other slots open.
strings.EQUIPMENT_MULTISHOPCARD_DESC: On use, gain 2 stacks of <style=cShrine>Credit Score</style>. Whenever you make a gold purchase and have at least 1 stack of <style=cShrine>Credit Score</style>, spend a stack to get <style=cIsUtility>10%</style> of the spent gold back. If the purchase is a <style=cIsUtility>multishop</style> terminal, the other terminals will <style=cIsUtility>remain open</style>.
